amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Secretary and the Administrator from issuing any final rule that might expand the scope beyond water bodies covered prior to Supreme Court rulings when implementing the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-231 to provide policy provisions that the Secretary and Administrator are prohibited from including in a final rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 248 (Roll no. 217).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 248 (Roll no. 217).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Edwards.
